welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yatomi, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, rich culture, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Yatomi has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Komaki AFB Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: This free WiFi network is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per session.
